columns.text: The wonderful Asteras Villas are a precious jewel managed by a courteous, professional and friendly team, passionate about adding the personal touches that make a stay truly memorable… Perched atop the majestic Caldera cliffs, looking down towards the endless Aegean Blue, Asteras Villas is a place where luxury dreams become reality. While on one side the property enjoys stunning uninterrupted views over the sea, on the other it is just a few steps away from the pebbled main street of Fira, the capital city of the magical island of Santorini. The Asteras Villas are just a precious jewel managed by a courteous team of extremely professional members that are there to put their touches in making your stay an even more memorable one. Each suite offers to the distinctive guest breathtaking views to the Caldera, Thirassia Island, the famous volcano and the traditional village of Oia. The overlook from the suites is stunning; the eye continues its endless traveling above blue and the daylight surrenders to the twilight glow. The sun dives to the tranquil golden-blue horizon-line offering ungrudgingly a dramatic breathtaking scenery. Nothing compares to the sunset from the Caldera of Santorini; probably the most romantic and definitely the most photographed sunset on earth

items.title: Opera Mansion Villa Santorini
items.description: The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island. In perfect alignment with the traditional Theran architecture, the Opera Mansion is a cave-like building boasting ample spaces and splendidly lavish features. In the very same place where the first modern Hellenic Theatre performance was held, couples relax and enjoy a luxurious stay , combining the scent of traditional Santorini with state-of-the-art amenities, private pools and amazing volcano view , just a breath from the imposing caldera and the central Fira path.Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.Upon reaching Opera Mansion, our team of professionals welcomes you to a whole new level of discreet services where privacy is never compromised and there is still always someone to tend to your every need or desire. From the special breakfast served in the vastness of the mansion with a fine selection of freshly baked pastries and high-quality ingredients to the concierge services eager to organize a private candlelight dinner under the starlit sky, you experience the ultimate fusion of romance, luxurious attentiveness and care.
items.excerpt: Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.

amenities.item: Private sea view deck with sun loungers and parasol
Underground Wine Cellar fully stocked with a fine selection of wines and dining table
Helicopter services, Yacht hiring Diving & snorkeling activities upon request

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Opera Mansion Villa Santorini

items.title: A&V Luxury Villa
items.description: Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort. Spacious and modern, built on three levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool, the villa offers privacy, without sacrificing the comforts found in a five-star hotel. It is the ideal setting for a lifetime trip for family get-togethers and parties of friends. Bright ample rooms are the main characteristic of the villa. Two fully equipped kitchens, a large living room and an elegant dining room allow the guests to gather and enjoy a traditional meal in the cozy atmosphere of the villa away from the daily crowd. Four comfortable bedrooms, each one featuring a king size bed and three fully renovated bathrooms (one for each level) are the perfect compromise to combine some privacy with the advantage of sharing a private luxury home with your love ones. The outdoor area features a private infinity pool, full sea views on the East coast of the island and an astonishing sunrise. A shaded lounge area under a pergola and sun beds and outdoor lighting for moonlight dinners.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista's A&V Luxury Villa is a spacious and modern villa built on 3 levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool. Perfect for family gatherings!

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort.
